name: q-space
description: An AI-driven app for learners to generate and practice questions.

scripts.install: concurrently --names "NODE,VITE" -c "cyan,green" "cd client && npm install" "cd server && npm install"
scripts.app: concurrently --names "NODE,VITE" -c "cyan,green" "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && npm run dev"
